REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1214 reute d f BC-ADMAR-<ADMR.O>-TO-BUY 04-21 0063

TEXT.TITLE: ADMAR <ADMR.O> TO BUY SELECTCARE
TEXT.BODY: Admar Group Inc said it agreed in principle to acquire SelectCare Management Co Inc for a combination of cash and stock totaling 3.6 mln dlrs. SelectCare, based in Torrance, Calif., manages alternative health care delivery systems, Admar said. It said the company has annual revenues of about 1.5 mln dlrs. Reuter
